title: Watch: Pooch Makes Heroic Rescue, Saves Elderly Man From Drowning In Ice

title: Teacher Charged With Attempted Murder, Allegedly Captured On Video Adding Toxic Plant To Husband’s Smoothie
description:
Not surprisingly, another teacher has done something evil. But this time it was off school grounds.

A man set up a hidden camera in his own home because he had thought his wife may have been messing with his smoothies. It turns out his assumptions were correct because she was allegedly poisoning him by putting a toxic plant into his smoothie.

— (@)

title: Hollywood Is Make A Woke And Inclusive Version Version Of ‘It’s a Wonderful Life’ Because Nothing Is Sacred
description:
Communists don’t create much of anything and tend to destroy nearly everything they touch. And because Hollywood is filled with a bunch of degenerate commies with no talent, it is never shocking to learn that a classic and timeless fan favorite will now be remade into a more woke and inclusive version. Which we all know will be very bad since there has never been a woke remake of anything better than the original. Not once.

title: Watch: Joy Reid Made To Look (More) Stupid By Moms For Liberty Co-Founder, Refuses To Condemn Book About Pedophilia
description:
Most people reading this know that Joy Reid is one of the worst hosts on TV. That is both an opinionated statement and a provable fact because not surprisingly, she has one of the worst-rated “news” channels on cable. And this story is exactly why no one watches her joke of a show.

Tiffany Justice, one of the co-founders of Moms for Liberty, agreed to an interview with Reid. That is what they agreed to. But that is not what happened. The segment ended up being Reid condoning books with abhorrent, deranged, and evil content, like the rape of a child by a teacher, saying that it should be up to the parents to decide if their kids should be exposed to “content” about pedophilia rape.

title: Illegal migrant, who sounds Middle Eastern, threatens American reporter: "Soon you’re gonna know who I am"
description:
A video is making its viral way around the Internets of a citizen journalist being threatened by an illegal migrant. The migrant was asked where they were from and lashed out instead of answering what should have been a simple question.

@1strespondermed on X was on the scene about 12 miles east of Sasabe when they approached the newly minted undocumented Democrat. And I know what you're gonna say upon watching this video. "Wait a second Brodigan, that guy looks and sounds nothing like a tired, poor, and huddled woman who survived the treacherous journey with her baby after being forced to flee Mexico due to climate justice."

title: Watch: Illegals actively look for Biden's Border Patrol to let them in (since Texas won't and barbed wire is sharp)
description:
